Thou art Indra of Indras, Smallest of the Small.

Thou art Indivisible, Thou art Non-attached.
Thou art Eternal, Thou art Supreme Light. 137.

Thou art Accountless, Thou art Garbless.
Thou art Coastless, Thou art Bottomless. 139.
Thou art Unborn, Thou art Bottomless.

translation: That Thou art Giver of Sustenance. That Thou art ever the Sustainer.

gurmukhi: krImul kmwl hYN ] ik husnl jmwl hYN ]152]
transliteration: Kareemula Kamaal Hai(n) ॥ Ki Husanala Jamaal Hai(n) ॥152॥
translation: That Thou art the perfection of Generosity. That Thou art Most Beautiful. 152.

gurmukhi: ZnImul i^rwj hYN ] ZrIbul invwz hYN ]
transliteration: Ganeemula Khhiraaja Hai(n) ॥ Gareebula Nivaaza Hai(n) ॥
translation: That Thou art the Penaliser of enemies. That Thou art the Supporter of the poor.

gurmukhi: hrI&ul iSkMn hYN ] ihrwsul iPkMn hYN ]153]
transliteration: Harafaiula Shikaanna Hai(n) ॥ Hiraasula Phikaanna Hai(n) ॥153॥
translation: That Thou art the Destroyer of enemies That Thou art the remover of Fear. 153.

gurmukhi: klMkM pRxws hYN ] smsqul invws hYN ]
transliteration: Kalaankan Pranaas Hai(n) ॥ Samasatula Nivaas Hai(n) ॥
translation: That Thou art the Destroyer of blemishes. That Thou art the dweller in all.

gurmukhi: AgMjul gnIm hYN ] rjwiek rhIm hYN ]154]
transliteration: Agaanjula Ganeema Hai(n) ॥ Rajaaeika Raheema Hai(n) ॥154॥
translation: That Thou art invincible by enemies. That Thou art the Sustainer and Gracious. 154.

gurmukhi: smsqul jubW hYN ] ik swihb ikrW hYN ]
transliteration: Samasatula Jubaa Hai(n) ॥ Ki Saahiba Kiraa Hai(n) ॥
translation: That Thou art the Master of all languages. That Thou art the Most Glorious.

gurmukhi: ik nrkM pRxws hYN ] bihsqul invws hYN ]155]
transliteration: Ki Narakaan Pranaas Hai(n) ॥ Bahisatula Nivaas Hai(n) ॥155॥
translation: That Thou art the Destroyer of hell. That Thou art the dweller in heaven.155.

gurmukhi: ik srbul gvMn hYN ] hmysul rvMn hYN ]
transliteration: Ki Sarabula Gavaanna Hai(n) ॥ Hamesula Ravaanna Hai(n) ॥
translation: That Thou art the Goer to all. That Thou art ever Blissful.

gurmukhi: qmwmul qmIj hYN ] smsqul AjIj hYN ]156]
transliteration: Tamaamula Tameeja Hai(n) ॥ Samasatula Ajeeja Hai(n) ॥156॥
translation: That Thou art the knower of all. That Thou art dearest to all. 156.

gurmukhi: prM prm eIs hYN ] smsqul AdIs hYN ]
transliteration: Praan Pram Ealasa Hai(n) ॥ Samasatula Adeesa Hai(n) ॥
translation: That Thou art the Lord of lords. That Thou art hidden from all.

gurmukhi: Adysul AlyK hYN ] hmysul AByK hYN ]157]
transliteration: Adesula Alekha Hai(n) ॥ Hamesula Abhekha Hai(n) ॥157॥
translation: That Thou art countryless and accountless. That Thou art ever garbles. 157.

gurmukhi: zmInul zmw hYN ] AmIkul iemw hYN ]
transliteration: Zameenula Zamaa Hai(n) ॥ Ameekula Eimaa Hai(n) ॥
translation: That Thou art in Earth and Heaven.. That Thou art Most Profound in signs.

gurmukhi: krImul kmwl hYN ] ik jurAiq jmwl hYN ]158]
transliteration: Kareemula Kamaal Hai(n) ॥ Ki Jurat(i) Jamaal Hai(n) ॥158॥
translation: That Thou art Most Generous. That Thou art embodiment of courage and beauty. 158.

gurmukhi: ik AclM pRkws hYN ] ik Aimqo subws hYN ]
transliteration: Ki Achalaan Prakaas Hai(n) ॥ Ki Amito Subaas Hai(n) ॥
translation: That Thou art perpetual illumination. That Thou art Limitless fragrance.

gurmukhi: ik Ajb srUp hYN ] ik Aimqo ibBUq hYN ]159]
transliteration: Ki Ajaba Saroop Hai(n) ॥ Ki Amito Bibhoot Hai(n) ॥159॥
translation: That Thou art wonderful entity. That Thou art Limitless Grandeur. 159.

gurmukhi: ik Aimqo psw hYN ] ik Awqm pRBw hYN ]
transliteration: Ki Amito Pasaa Hai(n) ॥ Ki Aatma Prabhaa Hai(n) ॥
translation: That Thou art Limitless Expanse. That Thou art selfluminous.

gurmukhi: ik AclM AnMg hYN ] ik Aimqo ABMg hYN ]160]
transliteration: Ki Achalaan Anang Hai(n) ॥ Ki Amito Abhang Hai(n) ॥160॥
translation: That Thou art Steady and Limbless. That Thou art Infinite and Indestructible. 160.
MADHUBHAR STANZA. BY THY GRACE.

gurmukhi: muin min pRnwm ] guin gn mudwm ]
transliteration: Muni Mani Pranaam ॥ Guni Gana Mudaam ॥
translation: O Lord! The sages bow before Thee in their mind. O Lord! Thou art ever the Treasure of virtues.

gurmukhi: Air br AgMj ] hir nr pRBMj ]161]
transliteration: Ari Bara Agaanj ॥ Hari Nara Prabhaanj ॥161॥
translation: O Lord! Thou canst not be destroyed by great enemies. O Lord! Thou art the Destroyer of all.161.

gurmukhi: An gn pRnwm ] muin min slwm ]
transliteration: Ana Gana Pranaam ॥ Muni Mani Salaam ॥
translation: O Lord! Innumerable beings bow before Thee. O Lord! The sages salute Thee in their mind.

gurmukhi: hir nr AKMf ] br nr AmMf ]162]
transliteration: Hari Nara Akhaand ॥ Bara Nara Amaand ॥162॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art complete controller of men. O Lord! Thou canst not be installed by the chiefs. 162.
O Lord! Thou art eternal knowledge. O Lord! Thou art illumined in the hearts of the sages.

gurmukhi: guin gn pRnwm ] jl Ql mudwm ]163]
transliteration: Guni Gana Pranaam ॥ Jala Thala Mudaam ॥163॥
translation: O Lord! The assemblies of virtuous bow before thee. O Lord! Thou pervadest in water and on land. 163.
O Lord! Thy body is unbreakable. O Lord! Thy seat is perpetual.
O Lord! Thy Praises are boundless. O Lord! Thy nature is most Generous. 164.

gurmukhi: jl Ql AmMf ] ids ivs ABMf ]
transliteration: Jala Thala Amaand ॥ Disa Visa Abhaand ॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art most glorious in water and on land. O Lord! Thou art free from slander at all places.

gurmukhi: jl Ql mhMq ] ids ivs ibAMq ]165]
transliteration: Jala Thala Mahaant ॥ Disa Visa Biaant ॥165॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art Supreme in water and on land. O Lord! Thou art endless in all directions. 165.
O Lord! Thou art eternal knowledge. O Lord! Thou art Supreme among the contented ones.
O Lord! Thou art the arm of gods. O Lord! Thou art ever the Only One. 166.
O Lord! Thou art AUM, the origin of creation. O Lord! Thou art stated to be without beginning.

gurmukhi: Kl KMf iKAwl ] gur br Akwl ]167]
transliteration: Khala Khaand Khiaal ॥ Gura Bara Akaal ॥167॥
translation: O Lord! Thou destroyest the tyrants instantly. O Lord thou art supreme and Immortal. 167.

gurmukhi: Gr Gir pRnwm ] icq crn nwm ]
transliteration: Ghara Ghari Pranaam ॥ Chita Charan Naam ॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art honoured in every house. O Lord! Thy Feet and Thy Name are meditated in every heart.
O Lord! Thy body never becomes old. O Lord! Thou art never subservient to anybody. 168.
O Lord! Thy body is ever steady. O Lord! Thou art free from rage.
O Lord! Thy store is inexhaustible. O Lord! Thou art uninstalled and boundless. 169.
O Lord! Thy Law is imperceptible. O Lord! Thy actions are most fearless.
O Lord! Thou art Invincible and Infinite. O Lord! Thou art the Supreme Donor. 170.
HARIBOLMANA STANZA, BY THE GRACE
O Lord! Thou art the house of Mercy. Lord! Thou art The Destroyer of enemies.

gurmukhi: Kl KMfn hYN ] mih mMfn hYN ]171]
transliteration: Khala Khaandn Hai(n) ॥ Mahi Maandn Hai(n) ॥171॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art the killer of evil persons. O Lord! Thou art the ornamentation of Earth. 171.
O Lord! Thou art the Master of the universe. O Lord! Thou art the supreme Ishvara.

gurmukhi: kil kwrx hYN ] srb aubwrx hYN ]172]
transliteration: Kali Kaarna Hai(n) ॥ Sarab Aubaarna Hai(n) ॥172॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art the cause of strife. O Lord! Thou art the Saviour of all. 172.

gurmukhi: iDRq ky DRx hYN ] jg ky kRx hYN ]
transliteration: Dharita Ke Dharan Hai(n) ॥ Jaga Ke Karan Hai(n) ॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art the support of the Earth. O Lord! Thou art the Creator of the Universe.

gurmukhi: mn mwinX hYN ] jg jwinX hYN ]173]
transliteration: Mana Maaniya Hai(n) ॥ Jaga Jaaniya Hai(n) ॥173॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art worshipped in the heart. O Lord! Thou art known throughout the world.173.

gurmukhi: srbM Br hYN ] srbM kr hYN ]
transliteration: Saraban Bhara Hai(n) ॥ Saraban Kara Hai(n) ॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art the Sustainer of all. O Lord! Thou art the Creator of all.

gurmukhi: srb pwisX hYN ] srb nwisX hYN ]174]
transliteration: Sarab Paasiya Hai(n) ॥ Sarab Naasiya Hai(n) ॥174॥
translation: O Lord! Thou pervadest all. O Lord! Thou destroyest all. 174.
O Lord! Thou art the Fountain of Mercy. O Lord! Thou art the nourisher of the universe.
O Lord! Thou art master of all. Lord! Thou art the Master of Universe. 175
O Lord! Thou art the life of the Universe. O Lord! Thou art the destroyer of evil-doers.

gurmukhi: pr qy pr hYN ] kruxwkr hYN ]176]
transliteration: Pra Te Pra Hai(n) ॥ Karunaakara Hai(n) ॥176॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art beyond everything. O Lord! Thou art the Fountain of Mercy. 176.
O Lord! Thou art the unmuttered mantra. O Lord! Thou canst be installed by none.

gurmukhi: AikRqw ikRq hYN ] AimRqw imRq hYN ]177]
transliteration: Akaritaa Karita Hai(n) ॥ Amaritaa Marita Hai(n) ॥177॥
translation: O Lord! Thy Image canst not be fashioned. O Lord! Thou art Immortal. 177.

gurmukhi: AimRqw imRq hYN ] krxw ikRq hYN ]
transliteration: Amaritaa Marita Hai(n) ॥ Karana Karita Hai(n) ॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art immortal. O Lord! Thou art the Merciful Entity.

gurmukhi: AikRqw ikRq hYN ] DrxI iDRq hYN ]178]
transliteration: Akaritaa Karita Hai(n) ॥ Dharanee Dharita Hai(n) ॥178॥
translation: O Lord Thy Image canst not be fashioned. O Lord! Thou art the Support of the Earth. 178.
O Lord! Thou art the Master of Nectar. O Lord! Thou art Supreme Ishvara.

gurmukhi: AikRqw ikRq hYN ] AimRqw imRq hYN ]179]
transliteration: Akaritaa Karita Hai(n) ॥ Amaritaa Marita Hai(n) ॥179॥
translation: O Lord! Thy Image canst not be fashioned. O Lord! Thou art Immortal. 179.

gurmukhi: Ajbw ikRq hYN ] AimRqw AimRq hYN ]
transliteration: Ajabaa Karita Hai(n) ॥ Amaritaa Amarita Hai(n) ॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art of Wonderful Form.O Lord! Thou art Immortal.

gurmukhi: nr nwiek hYN ] Kl Gwiek hYN ]180]
transliteration: Nara Naaeika Hai(n) ॥ Khala Ghaaeika Hai(n) ॥180॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art the Master of men. O Lord! Thou art the destroyer of evil persons. 180.
O Lord! Thou art the Nourisher of the world. O Lord! Thou art the House of Mercy.

gurmukhi: inRp nwiek hYN ] srb pwiek hYN ]181]
transliteration: Naripa Naaeika Hai(n) ॥ Sarab Paaeika Hai(n) ॥181॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art the Lord of the kings. O Lord! Thou art the Protector of all. 181.

gurmukhi: Bv BMjn hYN ] Air gMjn hYN ]
transliteration: Bhava Bhaanjna Hai(n) ॥ Ari Gaanjna Hai(n) ॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art the destroyer of the cycle of transmigration. O Lord! Thou art the conqueror of enemies.

gurmukhi: irpu qwpn hYN ] jpu jwpn hYN ]182]
transliteration: Ripu Taapana Hai(n) ॥ Japu Jaapana Hai(n) ॥182॥
translation: O Lord! Thou causest suffering to the enemies. O Lord! Thou makest others to repeat Thy Name.182.

gurmukhi: AklM ikRq hYN ] srbw ikRq hYN ]
transliteration: Akalaan Karita Hai(n) ॥ Sarba Karita Hai(n) ॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art free from blemishes. O Lord! All are Thy Forms.

gurmukhi: krqw kr hYN ] hrqw hir hYN ]183]
transliteration: Karataa Kara Hai(n) ॥ Harataa Hari Hai(n) ॥183॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art the Creator of the creators. O Lord! Thou art the Destroyer of the destroyers. 183.
O Lord! Thou art the Supreme Soul. Lord! Thou art the origin of all the souls.

gurmukhi: Awqm bs hYN ] js ky js hYN ]184]
transliteration: Aatma Basa Hai(n) ॥ Jasa Ke Jasa Hai(n) ॥184॥
translation: O Lord! Thou art controlled by Thyself. O Lord! Thou art not subject. 184.
BHUJANG PRAYAAT STANZA

gurmukhi: nmo sUrj sUrjy nmo cMdR cMdRy ]
transliteration: Namo Sooraja Sooraje Namo Chaandra Chaandre ॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Sun of suns! Salutation to Thee O Moon of moons!

gurmukhi: nmo rwj rwjy nmo ieMdR ieMdRy ]
transliteration: Namo Raaja Raaje Namo Eiandra Eiandre ॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O King of kings! Salutation to thee O Indra of Indras!
Salutation to Thee O Creator of pitch darkness! Salutation to Thee O Light of lights.!

gurmukhi: nmo ibRMd ibRMdy nmo bIj bIjy ]185]
transliteration: Namo Bariand Bariande Namo Beeja Beeje ॥185॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Greatest of the great (multitudes) Salutation to Three O Subtlest of the subtle ! 185
Salutation to Thee O embodiment of peace! Salutation to Thee O Entity bearing three modes!
Salutation to Thee O Supreme Essence and Elementless Entity!

gurmukhi: nmo jog jogy nmo igAwn igAwny ]
transliteration: Namo Joga Joge Namo Giaana Giaane ॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Fountain of all Yogas! Salutation to Thee O Fountain of all knowledge!

gurmukhi: nmo mMqR mMqRy nmo iDAwn iDAwny ]186]
transliteration: Namo Maantr Maantre Namo Dhiaana Dhiaane ॥186॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Supreme Mantra! Salutation to Thee O highest meditation 186.

gurmukhi: nmo juD juDy nmo igAwn igAwny ]
transliteration: Namo Judha Judhe Namo Giaana Giaane ॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Conqueror of wars! Salutation to Thee O Fountain of all knowledge!

gurmukhi: nmo Boj Bojy nmo pwn pwny ]
transliteration: Namo Bhoja Bhoje Namo Paana Paane ॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Essence of Food ! Salutation to Thee O Essence of Warter !

gurmukhi: nmo klh krqw nmo sWq rUpy ]
transliteration: Namo Kalaha Karataa Namo Saat Roope ॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Originator of Food! Salutation to Thee O Embodiment of Peace!
Salutation to Thee O Indra of Indras! Salutation to Thee O Beginningless Effulgence! 187.
Salutation to Thee O Entity inimical to blemishes! Salutation to Thee O Ornamentation of the ornaments

gurmukhi: nmo Aws Awsy nmo bWk bMky ]
transliteration: Namo Aas Aase Namo Baank Baanke ॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Fulfiller of hopes! Salutation to Thee O Most Beautiful!
Salutation to Thee O Eternal Entity, Limbless and Nameless!
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer of three worlds in three tenses! Salutation to O Limbless and Desireless Lord! 188.
EK ACHHARI STANZA
O Unconquerable Lord! O Indestructible Lord! O Fearless Lord! 189.
O Unborn Lord! O Perpetual Lord! O Indestructible Lord! O All-Pervasive Lord! 190.
Eternal Lord! O Indivisible Lord! O Unknowable Lord! O Uninflammable Lord! 191
O Non-Temporal Lord! O Merciful Lord! O Accountless Lord! O Guiseless Lord! 192.
O Nameless Lord! O Desireless Lord! O Unfathomable Lord! O Unfaltering Lord! 193.
O Masterless Lord! O Greatest-Glorious Lord! O Birthless Lord! O Silenceless Lord! 194.

gurmukhi: n rwgy ] n rMgy ] n rUpy ] n ryKy ]195]
transliteration: Na Raage ॥ Na Raange ॥ Na Roope ॥ Na Rekhe ॥195॥
translation: O Unattached Lord ! O Colorless Lord ! O Formless Lord ! O Lineless Lord ! 195
O Actionless Lord! O Illusionless Lord! O Indestructible Lord! O Accountless Lord! 196
BHUJANG PRAYAAT STANZA
Salutation to Thee O Most Venerated and Destroyer of all Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Indestructible, Nameless and All-Pervading Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Desireless, Glorious and All-Pervading Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer of Evil and Illuminator of Supreme Piety Lord! 197.
Salutation to Thee O Perpetual Embodiment of Truth, Consciousness and Bliss and Destroyer of enemies Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Gracious Creator and All-Pervading Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Wonderful, Glorious and Calamity for enemies Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer, Creator, Gracious and Merciful Lord! 198.

gurmukhi: c`qR c`kR vrqI c`qR c`kR Bugqy ]
transliteration: Chattra Chakkara Varatee Chattra Chakkara Bhugate ॥
translation: Salutation to Thee O Pervader and Enjoyer in all the four directions Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Self-Existent, Most Beautiful and United with all Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer of hard times and Embodiment of Mercy Lord!
Salutation to thee O Ever present with all, Indestructible and Glorious Lord! 199.
